item.title: 现货白银突破十月峰值后再创新高
item.description: 白银跃升至创纪录的水平，超过了 10 月份伦敦市场出现历史性挤压时创下的峰值。【原文：Silver jumped to a record, surpassing a peak set during a historic squeeze in the London market in October.】

item.title: 淡马锡以 46 亿美元的首次公开募股前价格入股 Quest Global
item.description: 据知情人士透露，新加坡国有投资者淡马锡控股公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）正在就收购 Quest Global Services Pte 股份进行深入谈判，这笔交易将使这家工程服务公司的估值达到 46 亿美元。【原文：Singapore state investor Temasek Holdings Pte is in advanced talks to buy a stake in Quest Global Services Pte, a deal that will value the engineering services firm at $4.6 billion, according to people with knowledge of the development.】

item.title: BI 称，Monte Paschi 首席执行官调查是 Mediobanca 交易的不利因素
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，针对 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 首席执行官路易吉-洛瓦格里奥（Luigi Lovaglio）的法律调查可能会增加该公司整合其最近收购的竞争对手 Mediobanca SpA 的难度。【原文：The legal probe targeting Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA Chief Executive Officer Luigi Lovaglio is likely to make it harder for the firm to integrate Mediobanca SpA, the rival it recently acquired, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 财政部长表示与国际货币基金组织关系紧张，塞内加尔债券走势疲软
item.description: 塞内加尔财政部长谢赫-迪巴（Cheikh Diba）表示了对该国财政状况的持续担忧，突显了该国在寻求新计划的过程中与国际货币基金组织在政府流动资金以弥补赤字问题上的紧张关系，此后塞内加尔主权债券下跌。【原文：Senegal’s sovereign bonds fell after Finance Minister Cheikh Diba flagged persistent concerns about the country’s finances, highlighting ongoing tensions with the International Monetary Fund over government liquidity to finance its deficit as it seeks a new program.】

item.title: 12 月份利润汇款将对巴西雷亚尔产生影响
item.description: 12 月份，巴西可能会有多达 100 亿美元的利润和红利汇款流出，这可能会再次对雷亚尔造成压力，并促使央行采取新的干预措施。【原文：Brazil may see as much as $10 billion in profit and dividend remittances leave the country in December, potentially renewing pressure on the real and prompting fresh central bank intervention.】

item.title: 加拿大经济因军事和住房问题大幅反弹
item.description: 随着加拿大经济增长的驱动力转向住房和政府支出，加拿大经济从贸易战最初的破坏中大幅反弹。【原文：The Canadian economy rebounded sharply from the initial damage of the trade war as the country’s growth drivers shifted to housing and government spending.】

item.title: 印尼央行称仍有进一步下调关键利率的空间
item.description: 印尼央行行长佩里-瓦尔吉约（Perry Warjiyo）表示，印尼央行正在寻找进一步下调基准利率的空间，并预测未来两年经济将强劲增长，尽管存在一系列全球风险，包括贸易形势和脆弱的市场。【原文：Bank Indonesia is looking for room to further cut its benchmark interest rate, Governor Perry Warjiyo said, forecasting robust economic growth in the next two years despite a range of global risks including the trade situation and fragile markets.】

item.title: 惠誉评级上调，赞比亚摈弃五年违约标签
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将赞比亚的信用等级上调至 B-，前景稳定。赞比亚美元债券收益率走低。【原文：Zambia has shaken off five years with a debt-default tag, with Fitch Ratings upgrading its assessment of the southern African nation’s credit to B- and a stable outlook. Yields on its dollar bond edged lower.】

item.title: 博洛雷获法院支持避免维旺迪股东赔款
item.description: 文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）在争取避免向维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）股东支付可能代价高昂的赔偿金（作为去年媒体集团解体的一部分）的斗争中，得到了法国最高法院的支持。【原文：Vincent Bolloré got a boost from France’s top court in his fight to avoid a potentially costly payout to Vivendi SE shareholders as part of last year’s breakup of the media conglomerate.】

item.title: 德国通胀跃升至九个月高点，欧洲央行思考前景
item.description: 德国通胀率意外升至九个月来的最高水平，在欧洲中央银行今年最后一次会议之前提醒人们，物价稳定的风险依然存在。【原文：Germany’s inflation rate unexpectedly rose to the highest level in nine months, offering a reminder before the European Central Bank’s final meeting of the year that risks to price stability remain.】

item.title: Nu、Revolut 引领金融科技对墨西哥中产阶级财富的追求
item.description:
来之不易的银行执照允许新进入者开展工资单存款业务

Hard-won banking licenses allow new entrants to pursue payroll deposits

item.title: 纹身墨水在体内移动，杀死免疫细胞，削弱疫苗反应
item.description: 纹身墨水并不只是静静地留在皮肤里。新的研究表明，纹身墨水会迅速进入淋巴系统，并在那里存留数月，杀死免疫细胞，甚至干扰人体对疫苗的反应。【原文：Tattoo ink doesn’t just sit inertly in the skin. New research shows it moves rapidly into the lymphatic system, where it can persist for months, kill immune cells, and even disrupt how the body responds to vaccines.】

item.title: 中投公司接近出售 10 亿美元的美国私募股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国 1.3 万亿美元主权财富基金--中国投资有限责任公司（China Investment Corp.【原文：China Investment Corp., the nation’s $1.3 trillion sovereign wealth fund, is close to finalizing the sale of about $1 billion in US private equity stakes following a temporary pause in the deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马歇尔-韦斯将向客户收取聘用人工智能人才的费用
item.description: 在激烈的人才争夺战中，选股对冲基金马歇尔-韦斯（Marshall Wace）将开始让客户为招聘和留住技术、交易和风险人员的成本上涨买单。【原文：Stock-picking hedge fund Marshall Wace will start making clients pay for the rising costs of hiring and retaining technology, trading and risk personnel amid an intense war for talent.】

item.title: 普拉达对范思哲进行改造，防止近期内出现更多收购行为
item.description: Prada SpA 首席执行官 Andrea Guerra 表示，Prada SpA 将在未来三年内对范思哲品牌进行改造，并不打算在此期间进行任何进一步的收购。【原文：Prada SpA will be occupied for the next three years revamping the Versace brand and doesn’t plan to make any further acquisitions in that time frame, Chief Executive Andrea Guerra said.】

item.title: 动荡之年临近，欧佩克+再次盘点
item.description: 该石油生产国集团明年可能不得不面对创纪录的供应过剩问题，从而加大了提高产量的难度。【原文：The oil producer group may have to contend with a record glut next year, making it harder to raise output.】

item.title: 黑色星期五促销拉开假日购物季序幕
item.description: 黑色星期五，佛罗里达州日出城，购物者进入一家 Lululemon 商店。摄影师：Eva Marie Uzcategui/Bloomberg【原文：Shoppers enter a Lululemon store on Black Friday in Sunrise, Florida. Photographer: Eva Marie Uzcategui/Bloomberg】

item.title: 人工智能购物机器人威胁颠覆亚马逊的电子商务霸主地位
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，斯宾塞-索珀将探讨人工智能购物机器人的出现对亚马逊商业模式的挑战。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Spencer Soper addresses the challenge for Amazon’s business model coming from the advent of AI shopping bots.】

item.title: CME 外汇平台重启，部分恢复运营
item.description: 芝加哥商业交易所在中断约 9 个小时后恢复了部分业务，但其主要的全球期货市场（从股票到债券和商品）仍处于瘫痪状态。【原文：The Chicago Mercantile Exchange restored some operations after an outage of about nine hours, but its major global futures markets from equities to bonds and commodities were still down.】

item.title: 经济数据仪表板蓬勃发展，追踪特朗普效应
item.description: 观察组织对美国政府官方数据中的任何异常情况都保持警惕。【原文：Watch groups are on the alert for anything out of the ordinary in the official US government data.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所（CME）故障引发的沮丧和困惑波及整个市场
item.description: 芝加哥商业交易所集团自豪地将自己描述为 "世界来此管理风险的地方"。但周五，世界被拒之门外。【原文：The Chicago Mercantile Exchange Group proudly describes itself as the place “where the world comes to manage risk.” Except on Friday, the world was shut out.】

item.title: 人工智能发电量激增后，美国公用事业股为何下跌？
item.description: 人工智能热潮带来的电力需求激增承诺，使美国电力公司的股价飙升至历史新高。但这些发电公司和公用事业公司现在才知道，炒作是有风险的：投资者不会永远等待结果。【原文：The artificial-intelligence boom’s promise of runaway electricity demand has jolted shares of US power companies to all-time highs. But those generators and utilities are now learning that the hype comes with an edge: Investors won’t wait forever for results.】

item.title: CDS 赔付率的不确定性将投资者挤出阿达赫交易
item.description: 在爱尔兰玻璃瓶和包装生产商 Ardagh Group SA 可能达成和解之前，信用违约掉期支付规则的不确定性给交易商带来了困惑。【原文：Uncertainty over the rules governing the payout of credit default swaps has sown confusion among traders ahead of a potential settlement tied to Ardagh Group SA, the Irish glass bottle and packaging maker.】

item.title: General Atlantic 支持的 ASG 医院计划在印度首次公开募股 3.91 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，超级眼科连锁专科医院 ASG Hospital Pvt.【原文：ASG Hospital Pvt., a super-specialty eye-care chain, is weighing an initial public offering that could raise as much as 35 billion rupees ($391 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金称英国央行回购改革有可能损害英国国债的吸引力
item.description: 对冲基金正在反击英格兰银行旨在限制英国债券交易商风险承担的提议，认为这些政策将损害流动性和市场的全球吸引力。【原文：Hedge funds are pushing back against Bank of England proposals intended to limit risk taking among UK bond traders, arguing the policies would hurt liquidity and the market’s global attractiveness.】

item.title: 意大利第三季度经济仍略有增长
item.description: 在国内需求的支持下，意大利第三季度经济略有增长，而不是像原先预计的那样停滞不前。【原文：Italy managed to notch up some slight growth in the third quarter amid support from domestic demand, instead of just stagnating as originally estimated.】

item.title: 新加坡将从 1 月起禁止高风险、不受欢迎的乘客登机
item.description: 新加坡将从 1 月起实施更严格的措施，防止不受欢迎或高风险旅客登上飞往新加坡的航班。【原文：Singapore will implement stricter measures to prevent undesirable or high-risk travelers from boarding flights to the city-state from January.】

item.title: 交易所故障影响期货市场，投资者盲目跟风
item.description:
数据中心故障导致芝加哥商业交易所期货和期权交易停止，引发了广泛的不满情绪。【原文：

A data center fault has halted trading of futures and options on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, triggering widespread frustration.

】

item.title: 尽管美国加征关税，印度经济增长仍为六季以来最快
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的高额关税给经济前景蒙上了阴影，但印度经济仍以六个季度以来最快的速度增长，彰显了印度经济的韧性。【原文：India’s economy grew at the fastest pace in six quarters, underscoring its resilience even as US President Donald Trump’s steep tariffs cloud the outlook.】

item.title: 希腊总统皮耶拉卡基斯寻求领导欧元区财政部长
item.description: 希腊财政部长基里亚科斯-皮耶拉卡基斯（Kyriakos Pierrakakis）将竞选欧元集团主席一职，届时他将领导欧洲重要的经济决策机构之一。【原文：Greek Finance Minister Kyriakos Pierrakakis will run for the presidency of the Eurogroup, a role from which he could lead one of Europe’s key economic decision-making bodies.】
